attributes.action: The Labour government needs too STOP ilegal migrants coming into the UK.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that our country values and believes are being diminished. Either Sir Keir Starmer STOPS it or steps down and resign.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Publish a detailed plan to tackle illegal migration and stop boat crossings:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709678
